<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 6"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Advanced Elemental Spell](/Feats.aspx?ID=2976) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Druid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=52" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 199 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[flame order](/DruidicOrders.aspx?ID=5), [stone order](/DruidicOrders.aspx?ID=6), [storm order](/DruidicOrders.aspx?ID=3), or [wave order](/DruidicOrders.aspx?ID=7)

</column>

---

Your connection to one of the great elemental aspects of nature deepens, allowing you further control over its powers. You gain the advanced order spell associated with your order: if you're a member of the flame order, you gain [combustion](/Spells.aspx?ID=1052); if you're a member of the stone order, you gain [stone lance ](/Spells.aspx?ID=1057); if you're a member of the storm order, you gain [powerful inhalation](/Spells.aspx?ID=1054); if you're a member of the wave order, you gain [pulverizing cascade](/Spells.aspx?ID=1055). Increase the number of Focus Points in your focus pool by 1.
name: Advanced Elemental Spell
prerequisite: flame order, stone order, storm order, or wave order
